00238     class BspLevelPtr : public SharedPtr<BspLevel> 
00239     {
00240     public:
00241         BspLevelPtr() : SharedPtr<BspLevel>() {}
00242         explicit BspLevelPtr(BspLevel* rep) : SharedPtr<BspLevel>(rep) {}
00243         BspLevelPtr(const BspLevelPtr& r) : SharedPtr<BspLevel>(r) {} 
00244         BspLevelPtr(const ResourcePtr& r) : SharedPtr<BspLevel>()
00245         {
00246             // lock & copy other mutex pointer
00247             OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(*r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00248             OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00249             pRep = static_cast<BspLevel*>(r.getPointer());
00250             pUseCount = r.useCountPointer();
00251             if (pUseCount)
00252             {
00253                 ++(*pUseCount);
00254             }
00255         }
00256 
00258         BspLevelPtr& operator=(const ResourcePtr& r)
00259         {
00260             if (pRep == static_cast<BspLevel*>(r.getPointer()))
00261                 return *this;
00262             release();
00263             // lock & copy other mutex pointer
00264             OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(*r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00265             OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00266             pRep = static_cast<BspLevel*>(r.getPointer());
00267             pUseCount = r.useCountPointer();
00268             if (pUseCount)
00269             {
00270                 ++(*pUseCount);
00271             }
00272             return *this;
00273         }
00274     };
00275 
00276 }
